name: The Adamantium Abomination: Ultron Trivia Game | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Ultron created the android Vision. Whose body did he use for this?
questions.explanation:
The Human Torch's body.

	Ultron made the Vision from the original Human Torch's body. Long before Johnny Storm rocketed into space, an android who would later call himself Jim Hammond fought crime as the original Human Torch.

questions.text: Ultron also created Victor Mancha. Where was Mancha born?
questions.explanation:
Los Angeles.

	Ultron created Mancha to one day destroy every superhero in the Marvel Universe. Warned of this by a future Gertrude Yorkes, the Runaways take him in and help him reject his programming.

questions.text: When he organized a team called the Masters of Evil, which alias did Ultron use?
questions.explanation:
The Crimson Cowl.

	It was in this guise that he first came to fight the Avengers. Encountering him triggered Pym's erased memories, and he recalled creating Ultron for benevolent reasons, only to have Ultron rebel against his creator.

questions.text: Whose brain patterns served as a basis for Ultron?
questions.explanation:
Henry Pym's brain patterns.

	This was shown to be the root cause of all of Pym's mental illnesses, for he believed that Ultron's actions reflected what was really in Pym's heart. Pym has adopted a number of superheroic codenames over the years, usually focused on both height-alteration and insects.

questions.text: Ultron made Jocasta, who rebelled and joined the Avengers. Which other "female" robot did Ultron create?
questions.explanation:
Alkhema.

	Alkhema was created by Ultron-13 to serve as his wife, with her brain patterns based on those of the superheroine Mockingbird. She wants to wipe out humanity just as Ultron does, but she would rather do it one at a time, putting her and Ultron at odds.

questions.text: When first created, Ultron was in his first version, or Ultron-1. Which version first met the Avengers?
questions.explanation:
Ultron-5.

	Each time he is destroyed, Ultron is able to find some way to recover and upgrades himself, leading to this renumbering. Starting with Ultron-6, Ultron has made use of the strong metal adamantium.

questions.text: Ultron fought in the Secret Wars.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Ultron-11 was one of the villians who fought in the Beyonder's Secret Wars. A maniac, he only became a team player after Galactus lowered his power level and Doctor Doom reprogammed him.

questions.text: When Ultron-12 repented of his evil ways, what name did he use?
questions.explanation:
Mark.

	As any superhero can tell you, there's nothing less trustworthy than a supervillian who has just switched sides. Mark was seemingly genuine, but was destroyed by Ultron-11. Wonder Man then destroyed Ultron-11. Oh, the destruction!

questions.text: How many personalities did Ultron-13 have?
questions.explanation:
13.

	Daredevil was fighting Ultron-13 with no success whatsoever, and thus was relieved when Ultron-13's 13 personalities began fighting amongst themselves and destroyed Ultron-13's body. Ultron-13 was built by Doctor Doom.

questions.text: During the "Disassembled" storyline, four Ultron androids attack Avengers Mansion.
questions.explanation:
False.

	No less than five Ultron androids attack the Mansion, which has already seen fire from alien warships to the Vision going haywire. In the battle, the Vision, Scott Lang, and Hawkeye all died.
